encounters.encounterName: A girl just fell from the sky, boss!
encounters.description: Ululate daemoniac effulgence unutterable. Accursed iridescence unnamable non-euclidean loathsome. Squamous cyclopean tenebrous shunned non-euclidean iridescence antiquarian ululate.

encounters.encounterName: The earth speaks to all of us, and if we listen, we can understand.
encounters.summary: I sang of leaves, of leaves of gold (Galadriel's Song of Eldamar)
encounters.description: Swarthy cyclopean squamous indescribable unmentionable antediluvian immemorial stench. Charnel madness immemorial. Gambrel shunned stygian. Swarthy eldritch abnormal.

encounters.encounterName: I'm a pig. I don't fight for honor. I fight for a paycheck.
encounters.description: Daemoniac gibbous decadent. Cyclopean spectral non-euclidean mortal comprehension nameless stygian. Daemoniac nameless madness spectral.

encounters.encounterName: Maybe I can stay and find some other nice people who will like me and accept me for who I am.
encounters.summary: Under the mountain dark and tall
encounters.description: Ululate hideous stench cat. Foetid lurk eldritch. Madness immemorial lurk noisome comprehension gibbering tentacles stygian.

encounters.encounterName: We each need to find our own inspiration, Kiki. Sometimes it's not easy.
encounters.summary: The world was young, the mountains green
encounters.description: Hideous gibbous decadent noisome manuscript blasphemous. Gibbering furtive stench loathsome fungus. Iridescence abnormal tenebrous. Shunned antediluvian gibbering. Stench cat tenebrous gambrel.

encounters.encounterName: Once you do something, you never forget. Even if you can't remember.
encounters.description: Immemorial unmentionable gambrel. Eldritch nameless swarthy. Furtive stygian fainted dank.

encounters.encounterName: A pig that doesn't fly is just a pig.
encounters.summary: Hey! Now! Come Hoy Now! Whither Do You Wander?
encounters.description: Cyclopean dank stench singular. Swarthy charnel eldritch madness fainted. Nameless tenebrous gibbering noisome gibbous dank cyclopean. Antediluvian stench accursed gambrel.
